title: Children of Bodom Guitar Tabs - 4 Studio Albums

Hello again!

As a guitarist, I&#039;ve looked far and wide for proper tablature and sheet music for my favorite bands and I know how frustrating it can be when you don&#039;t have enough time to sit down and learn songs by ear, when you&#039;re looking for tablature and can&#039;t find it and when you manage to find tablature but it ends up being incorrect or off in some way. 

So, as a way to shorten the process and hopefully save you some money, I did a little surfing and found compilations like these to help you out.

This compilation contains tablature for the following Children of Bodom albums:

Follow the Reaper

Something Wild

Hate Crew Death Roll

Hatebreeder


I apologize for not having compilations of "Are you Dead Yet?" and "BloodDrunk", but full album compilations are kind of hard to come by.



Hopefully they&#039;re as accurate and as helpful to you as possible. 

Keep in mind that all of these files are in .txt format.

Happy Playing! 



SEED! SEED! SEED!
